phrases: I realize I am a dreamer by nature,
but never in my wildest dreams did I ever imagine meeting the girl again.
When I was darkness at that time
God, I have only one request
Sorrow tumbling down is your song
All alone with nowhere to go in my life
Oh baby, help me from frozen pain
With your smile, your eyes, and sing me, just for me
I want to need your love
I want to need your love
Would it be all right if I show this person the place too?
Sorry but that would be a problem.
This customer has pretty well decided on this place.
Am I such a forgettable person?
I did not recognize you at first.
You look different with these clothes and hairdo.
You do not have a fixed style, do you?
- I would not really say we are friends... - Yes, we are!
If you have not made a decision yet,
can you please allow this young lady to see the place?
- I will take it! - Is that so?
- Wait a minute! - Wait a minute!
You cannot just decide like that!
But you seemed to be having a problem making up your mind.
- Wait a minute! - I am not waiting.
I am tired of staying at crappy capsule hotels.
I just want to hurry up and live any place that is available.
If any place will do, look elsewhere.
For me, it has to be this place!
What is wrong with you staying at your boyfriend's place?!
But as things are now, it is only a matter of time!
You were all lovey-dovey about him.
That is true, but let me tell you!
what are you going to do about renting this...
For someone in the business of serving customers,
There is more to doing your job than just go through the motions!
Who is this carefree old man?
This is Mr. Ando from the real estate agency at the train station.
He is a 52-year veteran in this business.
You two seem to be special acquaintances.
Why do not the two of you share this place?
This place is designed with the dining room in the middle,
so with a room on opposite sides, you can maintain your privacy.
Yet you will be there for each other when needed.
Plus, you will only be paying half the rent and living expenses.
- Half the rent?! - Half the rent?!
Let us go for it, Nana!
- It is like a dream to be able to stay... -
Then we will have to split our fees, too.
at such a wonderful place for so cheap!
but are you the kind of person who properly respects the privacy of others?
If privacy is an issue, you can put locks on your room doors.
I will arrange for that right away.
You are such a nice person.
Miss Osaki, sure it will be cheaper, but you really should think this through.
Sharing a flat with a stranger is nothing but annoying.
You are a lonely man, are not you, Yokoi?
Say, Mr. Ando, how soon can the locks be arranged?
If I made arrangements right away,
then it will be done sometime tomorrow morning.
I will be moving in tomorrow afternoon.
Then starting tomorrow, we are roommates, Nana-chan.
What in the world were you thinking?!
You are so easily fooled by others!
I do not think it is a good idea
for you to move in with a complete stranger.
She is not a complete stranger.
We sat next to each other on the train.
Coincidences like this have got to be...
Stop talking about the Demon Lord!
What are you upset about, Jun-chan?
that I am going to be living with another woman?
Well yeah, sure I would love to live with you if I could,
I betcha she thinks she can do you in.
It is'because you talk like that, that you attract that type of woman.
In addition, she might just as well be some serial murderer on the run.
Now if you are going to start living with this stranger,
you are aware that you might get yourself buried in cement
and sunk to the bottom of Tokyo Bay.
I do not care what happens to you,
and if something does happen, do not come crying to me.
But I do not think Shoji's going to approve.
Shoji's working today too, so I will tell him when he gets home.
He surely would not appreciate me showing up at work to tell him.
I am in the middle of work, too.
I do not have any clothes to sell to loafers.
Jun-chan's so lucky she gets to work at such a classy boutique.
She is got a nice figure, kind of, and she is got it made with Kyosuke.
I better hurry up and find a job.
I guess Shoji's not home yet.
But he got off work hours ago.
Your call is being forwarded to a voice messaging service.
Please leave a message after the beep.
Why is not he picking up?
If he is going to be late, he could at least call.
But come to think of it, we lived apart for a whole year.
It might not be so unusual if another woman did show up in his life.
It might not be so unusual if another woman did show up in his life.
he emailed me every day and he was busy studying,
so I did not even consider the thought of him fooling around...
But, he is a member of the male population...
A guy can do it with a girl even if he has no feelings of love for her.
He did say something crude like that, before we started dating.
If that is how he really feels,
he might just think nothing of cheating on me.
Who do you like better, me or that country girl?
My imagination is running away on me.
The name Sachiko means happy child.
So this is how hard it it to wait for a husband who does not come home.
Even though he is not my husband.
I wonder if this is how I was making Mr. Asano's wife feel.
Well, if that is the case, this is heaven's punishment!
You are going to catch cold!
But I sent you an email telling you I would be late.
I did not get any email!
How can you tell such an obvious lie?
I sent it to Junko by mistake...
I will be home late today.
A friend at work has a fever, so I have to work the evening shift to cover for him!
But I will still have enough energy left to have sex with you when I get home.
But I wonder why he does not just ask Nana to live with him?
It is nothing to wonder about.
He probably just wants her to become a bit more independent.
I could not agree more, but that is a pretty wild expectation.
Well, Shoji's spending this year studying,
so he worries that much more about this relationship.
He is not thinking about breaking up with her, is he?
I do not think he wants to do it just yet.
If he is going to university for four years,
he will not be able to support Nana until after that.
So he was wondering whether or not
he should just quit studying for the entrance exam
and find a full time job.
It is silly to throw your life plans out the door for a woman.
Do you think she can wait for all those years
until Shoji's ready to support her?
Say a mature, liberal-minded rich guy shows up.
She will be off with him in no time.
If a guy like that shows up, I would go with him too!
Hey, why are we talking about me now?
You are so easily fooled by others!
I do not think it is a good idea
for you to move in with a complete stranger!
If living alone makes you too nervous, you can stay here.
N-Not enough space in this one little room?
Want To go find another place?
You would not want to live with me.
I am always wanting my own way, and I whine.
You think I do not know that?
I am used to it, or rather, I have given up about that.
Those words were all I needed to hear.
You have chosen me over Sachiko.
I am going to rely on you too much all the time.
I do not want to be a burden anymore than I already am.
Before you go and become a burden on a complete stranger,
But like, I am twenty already!
I want to be a mature woman!
A classy woman the television viewers can idolize!
If at all possible, that is how I want you to be, too.
Anyway, if you are able to go and live on your own,
Just do not go moving in with a total stranger.
Why does not anyone trust Nana?
It is not her that we do not trust.
It is your ability to judge people.
You know Nana, she is beautiful, has a small face,
she is thin, has a husky voice, she is sooo cool!
She could be a top star in a musical.
What is that supposed to mean?
You feel attracted to a person just by their looks?
You would like her too, Shoji.
But what if you decide that you like her better than me?!
I could not go on living!
I will go to the apartment with you tomorrow.
You promise you will not fall in love with her?
I have got my hands full with you and Sachiko.
Sachiko is quite a wild woman.
So who the heck is Sachiko!
I was wondering what kind of an old rundown shack you were going to show me,
Seventy thousand yen for this place is a good deal.
What do you mean by that?!
Why did you guys come here with us?
Besides, I want to get a look at that girl
who has the guts to live with Nana.
Since when have you guys become believers of the Demon Lord?
I have not been given one yet.
Yeah, but I needed a guarantor to sign and seal it,
So you are not an official resident yet?
But I already paid the commission and stuff.
Someone is pulling one over on you!
How can you make such a mistake?
Maybe this is the right place!
Did you get the gas man to come and open the valve?
I have been waiting for you.
Oh, is your boyfriend with you?
- Mhm, my friends are here too.
Hey, she might just be my type.
I am going to catch cold!
What are you going to do for me if I lose my beautiful voice?!
So you are the other occupant.
Th-Th-Thank you for welcoming us in!
I am a friend of Nana Komatsu.
Oh, pardon me for not introducing myself earlier.
I am a friend of Nana Osaki, Yasushi Takagi by name.
I am also her acting benefactor.
but if you are ever in trouble, feel free to give me a call.
Then why do not you do something about this, Yasu?
I am in trouble because I have no hot water.
So you got to call the gas company to get a guy over here to open up...
Perhaps I will make some tea.
Hey, do you have a kettle and cups and stuff?
You got to wait for the gas guy to come
before you can use the burner anyway!
You have got to do that?
Also, fill this in and send it to the power company.
Your water bill will be debited from your bank account along with your rent,
so you do not have to worry about those.
Oh, and do not forget to register your new address with the City Hall.
Well Nana, I guess we will be leaving, then.
Looks like we can trust this guy to look after things for you.
Oh, are you leaving so soon?
The child does not know left from right,
but I hope you do befriend her.
Do not worry about me, Shoji.
Nana is here too, so I will be okay.
Shoji, you... be a man and go earn some money.
Well, it may be all right.
That lawyer, Takagi, is taking care of the other Nana and our Nana too.
The two of them seem to be getting along just fine.
Like, both placing herself above all?
The other Nana seems even weirder than our Nana.
Stop repeating Nana and Nana so much.
- My troubles are going to multiply.
Nana and I started living together on a positive note.
At least for me, that is.
Nana, the soonest the gas company people can make it here is tomorrow.
Then we cannot even heat this place until then?
You do not even have an air conditioner here.
If you are cold, put on something warm.
But I only brought my leather jacket.
I cannot get comfortable in that.
Oh, do you want me to lend you something?
When I first arrived in Tokyo,
I did not know whether I would be able to make it or not.
Could I get a job, would I be Shoji's girl forever?
I had a mountain of anxieties.
But as strange as it seems,
I had absolutely no qualms about moving in with you, Nana.
It is hard to explain why.
That is just how it was.
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
My hand had no place to go
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
